name: Ripe and Hyper
description:
Have you ever wanted to harvest some pesky veggies? We know we didn't, but here we are! Why not give it a shot?

The goal of the game is to throw restless vegetables into the jam maker in the right sequence in order to make the mystical rainbow jam. You have to be quick and agile though, as a timer ticks down.

You will grow carrots, cabbages, tomatoes and eggplants. These little rascals are key to making the best rainbow jam, but they won't make it easy on you. Harvest them by pressing E and throw them by pressing Q.

Have fun and try to beat all 3 levels!

Made for GMTK 2020

**GLITCH**

Unfortunately there is a game breaking glitch that prevents players from advancing past the first level. We hope you have fun regardless for what the game is worth.
